name: osmlint2csv
description: Convert [osmlint](https://github.com/osmlab/osmlint) output geojson file to csv file for uploading in to [To-Fix](https://github.com/osmlab/to-fix)

scripts.test: eslint src test converters/*/*.js && tape test/test.js | tap-spec

author: Ruben Lopez M <ruben@mapbox.com> (http://rub21.github.io/)
